titles.title: Let The Words Of My Mouth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the words of my mouth,
and the meditation of my heart,
be acceptable in thy sight, oh Lord.
Thou art my strength and my Redeemer.
Thou art my strength and my Redeemer.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For I am poor, and in need.
Yet the Lord thinketh upon me
Thou art my help and my deliverer.
Make no tarry, oh my God.
Make no tarry, oh my God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Que los dichos de mi boca
Y la meditación de mi corazón
Sean gratos delante de ti.
¡Oh Señor!
